ansible: object - Ansible plan data (for Ansible stacks)
cloudformation: object - CloudFormation plan data (for CloudFormation stacks)
kubernetes: object - Kubernetes plan data (for Kubernetes stacks)
pulumi: object - Pulumi plan data (for Pulumi stacks)

commit.author: string - Commit author
commit.exist_on_tracked_branch: boolean - Whether the commit exists on the tracked branch
commit.pull_request_id: integer - Pull request ID if the commit is from a PR

previous_run.based_on_local_workspace: boolean - Whether the run is based on local workspace
previous_run.branch: string - Git branch for the run

changes.phase: string - Phase of the change (plan or apply)
changes.moved: boolean - Whether the entity was moved

previous_run.command: string - Command executed for the run

commit.author: string - Commit author
commit.exist_on_tracked_branch: boolean - Whether the commit exists on the tracked branch
commit.pull_request_id: integer - Pull request ID if the commit is from a PR

creator_session.account_name: string - Account name for machine sessions
creator_session.admin: boolean - Whether the session has admin privileges
creator_session.creator_ip: string - IP address where the session was created
creator_session.machine: boolean - Whether this is a machine session
creator_session.member: boolean - Whether the user is a member of the account
creator_session.name: string - Display name of the user
creator_session.stack_id: string - Stack ID for machine sessions

previous_run.drift_detection: boolean - Whether this is a drift detection run

runtime_config.runner_image: string - Docker image used for the run

previous_run.triggered_by: string - Who or what triggered the run

request.remote_ip: string - IP address of the request origin

run.based_on_local_workspace: boolean - Whether the run is based on local workspace
run.branch: string - Git branch for the run

changes.phase: string - Phase of the change (plan or apply)
changes.moved: boolean - Whether the entity was moved

run.command: string - Command executed for the run

commit.author: string - Commit author
commit.exist_on_tracked_branch: boolean - Whether the commit exists on the tracked branch
commit.pull_request_id: integer - Pull request ID if the commit is from a PR

creator_session.account_name: string - Account name for machine sessions
creator_session.admin: boolean - Whether the session has admin privileges
creator_session.creator_ip: string - IP address where the session was created
creator_session.machine: boolean - Whether this is a machine session
creator_session.member: boolean - Whether the user is a member of the account
creator_session.name: string - Display name of the user
creator_session.stack_id: string - Stack ID for machine sessions

run.drift_detection: boolean - Whether this is a drift detection run

runtime_config.runner_image: string - Docker image used for the run

run.triggered_by: string - Who or what triggered the run

stack.administrative: boolean - Whether the stack is administrative
stack.branch: string - Git branch tracked by this stack
stack.locked_by: string - User who locked the stack, if any
stack.name: string - Stack display name
stack.terraform_version: string - Terraform version used by the stack

tracked_commit.author: string - Commit author
tracked_commit.exist_on_tracked_branch: boolean - Whether the commit exists on the tracked branch
tracked_commit.pull_request_id: integer - Pull request ID if the commit is from a PR

worker_pool.id: string - Worker pool identifier (null for public pool)
worker_pool.name: string - Worker pool name (null for public pool)
worker_pool.public: boolean - Whether this is the public worker pool

terraform: object - Terraform plan data (for Terraform stacks)
terragrunt: object - Terragrunt plan data (for Terragrunt stacks)
